hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT systemLog.id, systemLog.operationContent, moduleCategory.name, operator.name, systemLog.operationTime, site.name, systemLog.ip FROM SystemLog systemLog LEFT JOIN systemLog.site site LEFT JOIN systemLog.operator operator LEFT JOIN systemLog.moduleCategory moduleCategory WHERE systemLog.site.id = :siteId ORDER BY systemLog.operationTime DESC
FROM SystemLog systemLog WHERE systemLog.site.id = :siteId ORDER BY systemLog.operationTime DESC
FROM SystemLog systemLog WHERE systemLog.site.id = :siteId AND (systemLog.operationTime >= :startTime AND systemLog.operationTime <= :endTime) ORDER BY systemLog.operationTime DESC
FROM SystemLog systemLog WHERE systemLog.id IN (:logIds) AND systemLog.operator.name LIKE :userName ORDER BY systemLog.operationTime DESC
FROM SystemLog systemLog WHERE systemLog.id IN (:logIds) AND systemLog.moduleCategory.name LIKE :moduleName ORDER BY systemLog.operationTime DESC
DELETE FROM SystemLog systemLog WHERE systemLog.site.id = :siteId
